summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Faster ARRIS Processing feature for Premium/Elite users. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed: Premium/Elite plans show 'Fast ARRIS Processing' feature with ⚡ icon, Pro/Free/Starter plans correctly do NOT show this feature. ARRIS insights now include processing_time_seconds and priority_processed fields. Fixed a bug where these fields were being filtered out in the feature_gating.py filter_arris_insights function.
passed_tests: GET /api/arris/queue-stats requires authentication
GET /api/arris/queue-stats returns queue structure (fast_queue, standard_queue, currently_processing)
GET /api/arris/queue-stats returns processing_stats (total_requests, standard_requests, fast_requests, avg times)
GET /api/arris/my-processing-speed requires authentication
GET /api/arris/my-processing-speed returns 'standard' for Pro user
GET /api/arris/my-processing-speed returns 'fast' for Premium user
GET /api/arris/my-processing-speed returns 'standard' for Free user
GET /api/arris/my-processing-speed response includes processing_speed, tier, is_fast, benefits, message
GET /api/subscriptions/feature-access includes arris_processing_speed field
Pro tier has arris_processing_speed='standard' in feature-access
Premium tier has arris_processing_speed='fast' in feature-access
Submit proposal returns processing_time_seconds in ARRIS insights
Submit proposal returns priority_processed in ARRIS insights
Pro user proposal has priority_processed=False (standard processing)
Premium user proposal has priority_processed=True (fast processing)
GET /api/subscriptions/plans includes arris_processing_speed for all plans
Premium plan has arris_processing_speed='fast'
Elite plan has arris_processing_speed='fast'
Pro/Starter/Free plans have arris_processing_speed='standard'
Frontend: Subscription plans page shows 'Fast ARRIS Processing' for Premium tier
Frontend: Subscription plans page shows 'Fast ARRIS Processing' for Elite tier
Frontend: Subscription plans page does NOT show 'Fast ARRIS Processing' for Pro tier
Frontend: Subscription plans page does NOT show 'Fast ARRIS Processing' for Free tier
Frontend: Premium user dashboard shows PREMIUM badge in header
Frontend: Premium user ARRIS insights show '⚡ Fast Processing' badge
Frontend: Premium user ARRIS insights show processing time (e.g., 7.54s)
Frontend: Pro user dashboard shows PRO badge in header
Frontend: Pro user ARRIS insights do NOT show 'Fast Processing' badge
Frontend: Pro user ARRIS insights show processing time (e.g., 7.09s)

bug_fixed.issue: filter_arris_insights function was not including processing_time_seconds, priority_processed, and processing_speed fields in filtered output
bug_fixed.fix: Added these fields to the filtered dictionary so they are always returned regardless of tier

seed_data_creation: Premium test creator (premium@speedtest.com) has Premium subscription with fast ARRIS processing. Pro test creator (protest@dashboard.com) has Pro subscription with standard processing.

arris_insights_fields.processing_time_seconds: Included in ARRIS insights response - VERIFIED
arris_insights_fields.priority_processed: True for Premium/Elite, False for others - VERIFIED

subscription_plans_ui.premium_plan: Shows '⚡ Fast ARRIS Processing' feature - VERIFIED
subscription_plans_ui.elite_plan: Shows '⚡ Fast ARRIS Processing' feature - VERIFIED
subscription_plans_ui.pro_plan: Does NOT show Fast ARRIS Processing - VERIFIED
subscription_plans_ui.free_plan: Does NOT show Fast ARRIS Processing - VERIFIED

creator_dashboard_ui.premium_user: Shows '⚡ Fast Processing' badge in ARRIS insights - VERIFIED
creator_dashboard_ui.pro_user: Does NOT show Fast Processing badge - VERIFIED

mocked_apis.arris_ai: Real OpenAI via Emergent LLM Key - NOT MOCKED

context_for_next_testing_agent: ARRIS Processing Speed feature fully implemented and tested. Premium/Elite users get arris_processing_speed='fast' with priority queue processing. Free/Starter/Pro users get arris_processing_speed='standard'. ARRIS insights now include processing_time_seconds and priority_processed fields. Frontend shows '⚡ Fast ARRIS Processing' feature in subscription plans for Premium/Elite tiers, and '⚡ Fast Processing' badge in ARRIS insights for Premium users. Test credentials: premium@speedtest.com (Premium tier), protest@dashboard.com (Pro tier).
